name: Kevin Woodford
about: Following a career in some of the world’s most renowned kitchens, Kevin was appointed as a lecturer in professional cookery at Hull University and was rapidly promoted to head of department. He started his media career as a chef on ITV's This Morning, then presented several BBC cookery programmes, where he used his relaxed style, professional skill and ability to communicate at all levels to his advantage.
Kevin’s popularity with viewers led to other presenting jobs unrelated to cookery, including a stint on the BBC’s Holiday programme. He has also written several cookery books.
